# <a name="error-550553-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="2df53-102">Kļūda 550/553 Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2df53-102">Error 550/553 in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2df53-103">Kad esat prom no mājām un nosūtāt e-pastu no pievienotā konta, izmantojot Outlook.com, jūsu e-pasta ziņojums var tikt atgriezts ar 550, 553 vai pārraides aizlieguma kļūdas ziņojumu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2df53-103">When you're away from home and send an email from your connected account using Outlook.com, your email message might be returned with a 550, 553, or relay-prohibited error message.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="2df53-104">Pārbaudiet savus [e-pasta sinhronizācijas iestatījumus](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) **iestatījumos**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2df53-104">Check your [email sync settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) at **Settings**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="2df53-105">> **Skatīt visus Outlook iestatījumus** > **pasta** > **sinhronizācijas e-pastu**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2df53-105">> **View all Outlook settings** > **Mail** > **Sync email**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="2df53-106">Pārliecinieties, ka jūsu noklusējuma adrese ir tāda pati kā jūsu e-pasta domēna nosaukums.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2df53-106">Make sure your default from address is the same as your email domain name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2df53-107">Ja jums ir iekļauts savs e-pasta domēns, nomainiet to uz savu outlook.com, live.com vai hotmail.com adresi.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2df53-107">If you have your own email domain included, change it to your outlook.com, live.com, or hotmail.com address.</span></span>
